===== Ubuntu Desktop i386 - Live Session: =====
* LP: #Bug:477256 - [i855] Xserver freezing on Toshiba Satellite A10 (Intel 82852/855GM) - Triaged - High
   . ''Tester's comment:'' 2 tests:
     . 3.06GHz P4; 1.5GB RAM; P4M900 Chrome9 HC IGP
     . - boots OK
     . Toshiba satellite A10; 733MB RAM; Intel 82852/855GM IGP
     . - needs &quot;i915.modeset=0 xforcevesa&quot; added to boot line or it locks up. See bug 477256

     . Someone new to Linux likely isn&#039;t going to know to do that.

===== Ubuntu Desktop i386 - Live Session: =====
* LP: #Bug:477256 - [i855] Xserver freezing on Toshiba Satellite A10 (Intel 82852/855GM) - Triaged - High
   . ''Tester's comment:'' Severe problem on Dell Latitude X300 in relation to the intel video driver - using xforcevesa at boot does apparently fix it but it was NOT needed in Beta1, so this was introduced between Beta1 and 20100419.1 !!!
     . The bug seems to be same as https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xserver-xorg-video-intel/+bug/477256 
     . The Live ISO boots OK on a separate desktop, but on that one the FakeRAID 1 is not recognized !!!
